oai:repo.clarino.uib.no:11509/4;2017-01-10T15:54:41Z;hdl_11509_1;hdl_11509_2;UHR's Termbase for Norwegian higher education institutions;UHRs termbase for universitets- og høgskolesektoren;Lexical Conceptual Resource;Text;Terminological Resource;English;Norwegian;This is a collection of 2000 administrative terms with English - Norwegian bokmål/Norwegian bokmål - English and English - Norwegian nynorsk/Norwegian nynorsk - English translations, from the Norwegian Institutions of Higher Education (UHR).
        The termbase translates from Norwegian bokmål/Norwegian nynorsk to British English and the other way around.
        
        The term base is owned by the Norwegian Association of Higher Education Institutions (UHR) in Oslo (cf. web page: http://www.uhr.no/ressurser/temasider/terminologi).
        The term base has been made downloadable in TBX format by the META-NORD group at University of Bergen, with the kind permission of UHR.
        META-NORD has also assisted UHR in providing a license for the downloadable version as well as for the online, browsable version.;2012-06-13;lexicalConceptualResource;http://hdl.handle.net/11509/4;eng;nor;http://hdl.handle.net/11509/122;Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported (CC BY-NC-SA 3.0);http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/;CC;application/octet-stream;application/octet-stream;text/xml;downloadable_files_count: 2;The Norwegian Association of Higher Education Institutions;Universitets- og høgskolerådet;http://github.com/clarino/uhrtermlists/
name: eb7c91c1-569c-5df0-8cd4-476f7e396582
notes:
This is a collection of 2000 administrative terms with English - Norwegian bokmål/Norwegian bokmål - English and English - Norwegian nynorsk/Norwegian nynorsk - English translations, from the Norwegian Institutions of Higher Education (UHR).
        The termbase translates from Norwegian bokmål/Norwegian nynorsk to British English and the other way around.
        
        The term base is owned by the Norwegian Association of Higher Education Institutions (UHR) in Oslo (cf. web page: http://www.uhr.no/ressurser/temasider/terminologi).
        The term base has been made downloadable in TBX format by the META-NORD group at University of Bergen, with the kind permission of UHR.
        META-NORD has also assisted UHR in providing a license for the downloadable version as well as for the online, browsable version.
title: UHR's Termbase for Norwegian higher education institutions
UHRs termbase for universitets- og høgskolesektoren
